MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Beansburn and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.20pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our engineers have now located an underground cable fault on Glasgow Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.54pm on Monday 12th April 2021.
